welcome_message_body: Welcome to Malolos, Philippines! Enjoy the city's rich history, beautiful heritage sites, and warm hospitality as you explore and discover the charm of this historic city.

restaurants.name: Citang's Eatery
restaurants.description: Citang's Eatery is a filipino restaurant located in Malolos.
restaurants.address: Fr Kuatro Kantos St, 3000 Malolos, Bulacan

restaurants.name: Red Ribbon
restaurants.description: Red Ribbon is a bakery located in Malolos.
restaurants.address: TR III Bldg, Paseo del Congreso, 3000 Malolos City, Bulacan

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Malolos.

restaurants.name: Pancake House
restaurants.description: Pancake House is a breakfast spot located in Malolos.
restaurants.address: Robinsons Place Malolos, 3000 Malolos City, Bulacan

restaurants.name: Jollibee
restaurants.description: Jollibee is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for handling cargo shipments at Baler Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal exclusively serves Philippine Airlines and its subsidiary PAL Express.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest international terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines, including Cebu Pacific and AirAsia.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users are required to register and provide a valid email address to access the service.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
